channel.title: Attack on Gmail Accounts/Twitter Accounts (Germany)
channel.description: Hey, Recently, the last two days, several twitter accounts of political organizations got hacked. From what I know, the hackers used a security gap of gmail in order to get into the twitter accs and leak private information. I wondered if any of you guys know more about this topic. Thanks :)

item.title: Attack on Gmail Accounts/Twitter Accounts (Germany)

item.description:
This topic was automatically closed 3 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Read full topic

item.title: Attack on Gmail Accounts/Twitter Accounts (Germany)
item.dc:creator: a0under1s
item.description:
pry0cc:

Spoof the phone of the account -> send SMS to twitter -> posts on victims twitter account.

I am kinda not sure if that is all behind it, because many content creators, who as well got victim of the attack, say that the hacker has been writing in private conversations/…
If something like that is as well possible with sms spoofing, then excuse me

Read full topic

item.description:
Thanks for your commitments so far.
For all who want to have like the full view of the advent calendar guy on twitter, I recommend web.archive.org + the name _0rbit
Have fun

Read full topic

item.title: Attack on Gmail Accounts/Twitter Accounts (Germany)
item.dc:creator: occupi
item.description:
I’ve been trying to follow this breach for the last two days and haven’t gotten very far because of the immense amount of data.

The best tweet I’ve seen summing it up is this:

twitter.com

Karolin Schwarz (raeuberhose)

For the international audience: It was a few journalists whose accounts have been breached. Other journalists have been doxed because the hacked journalists‘ phone books were part of the data captured. #btleaks twitter.com/JulianRoepcke/…

Julian Röpcke @JulianRoepcke

Also hacked were around 40 German public TV journalists and 10 artists, most of them known for their left-leaning political stance. Also from the artists, comedians, moderators etc partially very private data was leaked, in some cases nonetheless only mobile number. #BTleaks
11:04 AM - 4 Jan 2019 27 14

I have a copy of the pastebin text if anyone wants it. I’d rather not post it publicly due to the intense scrutiny this hack is getting.

Read full topic

item.title: Attack on Gmail Accounts/Twitter Accounts (Germany)
item.dc:creator: pry0cc
item.description:
Yes!

I don’t know the specifics of the method with gmail, but I know a method has recently been revealed with SMS spoofing, where twitter will automatically post tweets of SMS’s you send to the number, from your linked phone number.

Spoof the phone of the account -> send SMS to twitter -> posts on victims twitter account.

Not sure if anybody else knows much about this?

Read full topic

Hey,
Recently, the last two days, several twitter accounts of political organizations got hacked.
From what I know, the hackers used a security gap of gmail in order to get into the twitter accs and leak private information.
I wondered if any of you guys know more about this topic.
Thanks
